document.full_text: a new york building set to be demolished for an islamic cultural center and mosque should be preserved as a monument of the september 11 al qaeda attacks, opponents of the mosque project said in court tuesday.
document.title: new york mosque project site faces legal challenge
lines_and_colors: a new york building set to be demolished for an islamic cultural center and mosque should be preserved as a monument of the september 11 al qaeda attacks, opponents of the mosque project said in court tuesday.
